entry.title: Combined summary - REWARD offered for hash collisions for SHA1, SHA256, RIPEMD160 and others
entry.summary: This context offers bounties for demonstrating collision attacks against various cryptographic algorithms, particularly SHA1. To earn the bounty, one must provide two messages that result in the same digest when hashed but are not equal in value. These messages will be used in a scriptSig to satisfy the scriptPubKey holding the bountied funds, allowing the collector to transfer them to a scriptPubKey of their choice. The context welcomes additional donations to the bounties.The context also includes information about the decodescript command for different algorithms such as SHA1, SHA256, and RIPEMD160. It provides notes and limitations for collecting bounties, including the advice to mine the block yourself when collecting your bounty since scriptSigs do not cryptographically sign the transaction's outputs.
